ApplicationContextConfiguration - Class in com.premiumminds.webapp.utils
Class for the application configurations at servlet level With this you can have different configurations depending on the web.xml This is a singleton, so you can access it anywhere on the code

Class to load the Application configurations at the servlet context the context parameter used is "app-config"

W

WebAppFileLoader - Class in com.premiumminds.webapp.utils
Class to load resources of web applications It can load from - the application context (context:/path/to/file), - the application classpath (classpath:/com/package/ResourceName.txt), - the filesystem (filesystem:/path/to/file)
WebAppFileLoader(String, ServletContext) - Constructor for class com.premiumminds.webapp.utils.WebAppFileLoader
Create a file loader with a context
WebAppFileLoader(String) - Constructor for class com.premiumminds.webapp.utils.WebAppFileLoader
Create a file loader, BUT THIS CAN'T USE THE CONTEXT!!!
